name: Vasili Tokarev
story: Vasili grew up in a small village in western Russia. Always fascinated with military weaponry and strategy, he joined the Russian army at the age of 18. He quickly rose through the ranks, impressing his superiors with his dedication and discipline. Vasili is now a trusted Autorifleman, responsible for providing support to his squad with his powerful machine gun. He is married to his high school sweetheart, and they are expecting their first child.
